nodes.text: Marching Orders is a short story written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on July 27, 2005.

After the Jedi Council decides to send most of the Jedi at the Almas Academy to fight in the Clone Wars, Jedi Master Darrus Jeht traveled to the Academy to inform them. Afterward, he puts the Cularin system under martial law, as it became vulnerable without the Jedi presence.
